original_text: Moreover the light of the moon shall be as the light of the sun, and the light of the sun shall be sevenfold, as the light of seven days, in the day that the Lord bindeth up the breach of his people, and healeth the stroke of their wound.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 백성의 상처를 싸매시며 그들의 맞은 자리를 고치시는 날에는 달빛은 햇빛 같겠고 햇빛은 일곱 배가 되어 일곱 날의 빛과 같으리라

sentences.original_text: Moreover, light of the moon shall be as the light of the sun
and the light of the sun shall be sevenfold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 태양빛은 일곱 배가 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: as the light of seven days
in the day that the Lord bindeth up the breach of his people
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그 백성의 상처를 싸매시는 날에

sentences.original_text: and healeth the stroke of their wound
